name: npm-modules-sync
description: Keep your globally installed NPM modules in sync across multiple machines.

scripts.build: npm run flow && npm run lint && flow-remove-types src/ --out-dir build/
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec tests/tests.js -t 100000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Riyadh Al Nur <riyadhalnur@verticalaxisbd.com> (https://www.verticalaxisbd.com/)
